alert.note: Alert for Lower Koyukuk and Middle Yukon Valleys (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Watch issued May 13 at 5:39PM AKDT by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...FLOOD WATCH FOR AN ICE JAM NOW IN EFFECT THROUGH SATURDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by an ice jam continues to be possible as the breakup front moves downriver. * WHERE...Yukon River at Koyukuk. * WHEN...Through Saturday evening. * IMPACTS...Water levels in Koyukuk continue to remain high as the breakup front moves downriver. Expect water levels at Koyukuk to fluctuate into Saturday. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - An ice jam may cause water to infiltrate the lowlands along the river. - Http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: You should monitor later forecasts and be alert for possible Flood Warnings. Those living in areas prone to flooding should be prepared to take action should flooding develop.

area.areaDesc: Lower Koyukuk and Middle Yukon Valleys
